entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
